Ιδιαίτερες ευχαριστίες στούς
Andreas Krings, Jake Wharton, Jeremy Feinstein, Roman Nurik, Simon Vig Therkildsen, Soarcn, Tjerk Wolterink για τις φανταστικές βιβλιοθήκες τους.
Brankic1979 and Nick Frost για τα πανέμορφα πακέτα εικονιδίων.
Και σε όλους τους εθελοντές που μας βοήθησαν με την μετάφραση του Money Lover σε πολλές άλλες γλώσσες.

Have more than one wallet, budget plan, saving plan, event plan.\nNo more advertisement!
Enjoy the basic Money Lover with no more advertisement!
Free version can add one budget, one saving, one event only, and cannot use all features. Please go premium to create unlimited budgets, savings, events and access to all features
Ο κωδικός άδεια δεν είναι σωστός
Ο κωδικός άδεια είναι έγκυρος. Είστε πλέον σε θέση να έχετε πρόσβαση σε όλα τα χαρακτηριστικά %1$s

So you can add transaction about it later
Money Lover is going to transfer your data from old version to new one. Do you want to continue?
In this version, billing feature was disabled temporary although your bill data still will be transferred.
If you change your mind later, you still can select migrate in %1$s. But all your new data from now on to that moment will lose permanently.
Transferring and converting old accounts into wallets
An error has occurred when importing data
Select one file below to restore data from

From this version, we use the new file extension .mlx , but you still can import both .money and .mlx file into %1$s
Το αντίγραφο ασφαλείας δημιουργήθηκε με επιτυχία
This application is built on the habits of shoppers. It increases the efficiency and speed of your shopping experience, and also prevents any unnecessary mistakes.

Exchanger is a simple way to convert currency in mobile.
- Nice design with flat design
- 100+ world currencies
- Convert multi-currencies in one time
- Offline mode (do not need network).
Don\'t show Rate App notification again
Θέλετε να διαγράψετε μόνιμα αυτά τα αρχεία;
Θέλετε να επαναφέρετε δεδομένα από το αρχείο %1$s; Όλα τα τρέχοντα δεδομένα σας θα διαγραφούν!
Η αυτόματη δημιουργία αντιγράφων ασφαλείας απέτυχε. Η διαδικασία αποκατάσταση δεν μπορεί να συνεχιστεί.
Παρακαλώ περιμένετε έως ότου φορτωθούν τα στοιχεία.

We are upgrading Money Lover into new version and migrating your data from the old one to the new one. During the process, you may experience some losses of data, sometimes, unfortunately, all of them.

Technically, your data is still there as we will not delete them if the migrate process goes wrong.

If you find yourself into this situation, please contact us and we will help you find your data back.
Σχετικά με την απόλεια δεδομένων μετά την ενημέρωση
Γεια σας, \nI ήθελα να μεταφράσετε τις ακόλουθες γλώσσες: \n
We\'re working on translating new version of Money Lover into other languages but this process can take a while, so we really need help from our users to speed it up.
Please help us if you can translate from English to other languages. You can contact us for further information.

Do you want to reset all data? All data such as wallets, transactions, budgets, savings or events will be removed. This action CAN NOT be undone.

Show this dialog automatically when add transaction

After enter promotion code, you could create an Money Lover account to link your account with your Premium status. If you have another device, login Money Lover with your account so Premium status in that device will be automatically activated.

Two new icon packs are available for using for category, event and saving. You can create a new category to see them right now!

Promote code is valid. Now you can use all features as a Premium user! Thank you for using %1$s
TIP: Register a %1$s account to link your Premium status with that account, so next time you login to %1$s, you will have your Premium status back.
It would be cool to share this code to your friends! Don\'t worry, it won\'t affect your Premium status.
